scripts.gitpush: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push
scripts.prerelease: lerna bootstrap && lerna link && git add . && git commit -m "prepublish" && git push
scripts.release2:patch: cross-env RELEASE_TYPE=patch lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --patch"
scripts.release2:minor: cross-env RELEASE_TYPE=minor lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --minor"
scripts.release2:major: cross-env RELEASE_TYPE=major lerna exec "yarn publish --access public --major"
